Proven track record of automating data pipelines and enhancing application throughput, resulting in significant efficiency gains. Adept at collaborating within diverse teams to solve complex business challenges in fast-paced environments. Eager to leverage my skills in driving transformation at Capital One while delivering exceptional customer value.
